Body: I'm using CM 10.2 nightlies on my S 3 (i9305, intl. w/ LTE).However, even though I seem to be connected to a network - the status icon is greyed out.What's even weirder: I can access the web, but not the Play Store, which just displays 'No connection' and 'try again'.See:but:Notice the grey WiFi icon in the top right corner - it used to be blue!How can I diagnose/fix this issue?
Title: CM network connection icon is grey

history.Text: I'm using CM 10.2 nightlies on my S 3 (i9305, intl. w/ LTE).However, even though I seem to be connected to a network - the status icon is greyed out.What's even weirder: I can access the web, but not the Play Store, which just displays 'No connection' and 'try again'.See:![enter image description here][1]but:![enter image description here][2]Notice the grey WiFi icon in the top right corner - it used to be blue!How can I diagnose/fix this issue?  [1]: http://i.stack.imgur.com/MrZvR.png  [2]: http://i.stack.imgur.com/KT1LH.png
CM network connection icon is grey

I'm using CM 10.2 nightlies on my S 3 (i9305, intl. w/ LTE).However, even though I seem to be connected to a network - the status icon is greyed out.What's even weirder: I can access the web, but not the Play Store, which just displays 'No connection' and 'try again'.See:![enter image description here][1]but:![enter image description here][2]Notice the grey WiFi icon in the top right corner - it used to be blue!How can I diagnose/fix this issue?
